item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-12-30
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Oh the weather outside is...holy monkey jebus it's COLD! #
  • Thought the new FictFact book details page was done, then looked at it in IE8. Design is perfect in Safari, Firefox & Chrome. IE you suck. #
  • A Foolish view on Marvel and Disney - #
  • The Wikipedia list of never built Disney Attractions, Theme Parks, Resorts, and more...http://bit.ly/7hjfUn #
  • Sonoma ready for a walk #

Powered by Twitter Tools
